name: Egg heights
description:
make sure your mouse is captured by the game screen to play

CONTROLS:

Move egg: W,A,S,D

Move camera: Mouse

You can also use a gamepad:

Move egg: Left stick

Move camera: Right stick

Made by Alec Acosta
Pre made rock and bush: BenjiToddArtist
SFX: Zapsplat.com

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2,  August 2022
